General.Name: Wahana Inti MakmurTbk PT
General.Description: PT Wahana Inti Makmur Tbk produces and sells rice in Indonesia. The company offers aromatic, healthy, tarabas, medium grain, premium grade, and basmati rice, as well as private labeled rice. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia.
General.Address: Duta Indah Iconic Tower G, Tangerang, Indonesia, 15143
